name: Abraca
description:
Now is the time for justice!

In this Roguelite game, players will be able to learn spells, strengthen skills, use the currency obtained from battles to purchase items from mysterious merchants, kill numerous demon claws, and ultimately conquer this world!

Game features:



In the level, you can learn spells, enhance skills, purchase items, and discover various mini games that can enhance yourself. [/list]


In the base, you can change heroes, strengthen equipment, and learn talents. [/list]


  • Although this is a meat pigeon, it is actually more like an RPG for brushing treasure. You can use various equipment items to match your tactics in battle.
